text: ai eemaanadaaron un logon ke aise na bano jo kaafir ho gae bhaee band unake parades mein nikale hain ya jehaad karane gae hain (aur vaho) mar (gae) to unake baare mein kahane lage ki vah hamaare paas rahate to na marate or na maare jaate (aur ye is vajah se kahate hain) taaki khuda (is khyaal ko) unake dilon mein (baise) hasarat bana de aur (yoon to) khuda hee jilaata aur maarata hai aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda use dekh raha hai
